grade: Jōyō kanji, taught in junior high
on reading compounds: 衰退【スイタイ】decline, degeneration, decay, waning, ebbing
衰弱【スイジャク】weakness, debility, breakdown, prostration
減衰【ゲンスイ】attenuation, damping, decay
盛衰【セイスイ】rise and fall, ups and downs, welfare, vicissitudes
kun reading compounds: 衰える【おとろえる】to become weak, to decline, to wear, to abate, to decay, to wither, to waste away
